author: jonesde
msg: Some improvements to the last view and view save code to handle request attributes and more parameters, safe since they are never going int he URL or anything; this resolves the issues I was running into before with this, and hopefully with no side effects other than a few CPU cycles here and there; made sure that the stuff is serializable before putting into the session

author: gsim
msg: Added some extra debug information on failover time.

msg: o Restored compat with 2.x where the root is not resolved for ArtifactResolver.resolveTransitively()
